name: Spaceship Demo (SentientDragon5GameDev)
description:
I was watching cowboy bebop again and just really had the strong desire to fly a spaceship.  I was like you know what? I am going to make a spaceship game. 

I spent too many hours just playing my own game than doing other things :) it made me happy. So i figured I post it here if flying spaceships makes anyone else happy. The controls are a bit odd on  keyboard, I got a cheap controller that I have been using to prototype . I recommend using a controller if you have one, otherwise use the mouse or keyboard.

If you have any suggestions or find any bugs, lemme know in the comments. Also please let me know if you liked this prototype, I am trying to decide what I want to make next so if you like where this was going (this was like a day or two's work that I just procrastinated on posting) then let me know in the comments!

Credits for all the models is in the game. Also I added quality levels, unfortunately even the medium quality lags a bit for me :( the only real difference is the shadow quality.
